thread.title: Pete O'Sullivan

author: Pete O'Sullivan
title: Pete O'Sullivan
text: Technician arrived as advised and did a great job replacing the tyres on my XF. Tyre prices were competitive compared to other 'we come to you' tyre fitting services (around Â£30 a tyre cheaper than a competitor for same tyre).Technician was friendly and helpful. Electronic service record and receipt arrived by email shortly after completion of work. Would certainly use Tyres on the Drive again and would be happy to recommend to friends.
